author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tension gripped Government Engineering College in Bodi near here on Friday as two sections of students clashed with each other.

Police said that there was enmity between first year and second year students over ragging. The senior students warned juniors to behave properly on the campus and give respect to them.

Both the groups quarrelled with each other, and later it snowballed into a group clash on Friday. The student groups attacked each other. The police intervened and brought the situation under control.
title: Students clash in engineering college in Bodi
